title: Dropdown Pattern
excerpt: Providing a compact way to present multiple options.
content:
The dropdown pattern, also known as a select menu, is a UI element that allows users to choose one option from a list. It's a space-efficient way to present multiple options, especially when screen space is limited.

Use Cases

  • Selecting from a list of predefined options
  • Filtering content
  • Navigation menus on mobile devices

Best Practices

  1. Use clear and descriptive labels
  2. Organize options in a logical order
  3. Provide a default selection when appropriate
  4. Consider using autocomplete for long lists
  5. Ensure keyboard accessibility
